item.description: Come join us for a Pot Luck on April 8th. Everyone is welcome! At this particular Pot Luck, we will be selecting our next 6 books for our Book Club. This was a popular idea. This gives everyone some time to find the books. And an opportunity to get a good deal on them!! You could even start on the next book if you are a speedy reader! We feel the best way for this to work is for all ideas to be put in a "hat" and pick the 6 randomly. So bring your ideas and your contribution for the Pot Luck! Look forward to seeing everybody.
item.name: Pot Luck
